seo: 用友ERP,目录遍历漏洞,检测,插件
seo_en: Yonyou ERP, directory traversal vulnerability, detection, plugin
summary: 该插件用于检测用友ERP NC系统是否存在目录遍历漏洞，通过发送特定payload请求并分析响应内容来确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether there is a directory traversal vulnerability in the Yonyou ERP NC system. It confirms the existence of the vulnerability by sending specific payload requests and analyzing the response content.
